original_text: You know that your bodies are parts of Christ's own body. So you must never take your body and make it join with a prostitute's body. That is like you have done it with part of Christ's body. Never let that happen!
korean_text: 너희 몸이 그리스도의 지체인 줄을 알지 못하느냐 내가 그리스도의 지체를 가지고 창녀의 지체를 만들겠느냐 결코 그럴 수 없느니라

sentences.original_text: are parts of Christ's own body.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도의 몸의 지체인 줄을 알지 못하느냐

sentences.original_text: So you must never take your body
and make it join with a prostitute's body.
That is like you have done it
